department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Provide Electronic Fund Transfers (EFT) services to the Receiver General for Canada (RG) and ensure the effective and efficient processing of fund transfers to ensure a high quality experience for users initiators.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:, The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Receiver General for Canada (RG) requires a formal arrangement with a single service provider for processing and reporting of incoming Electronic Fund Transfers (EFTs).
